item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，蓝色起源公司准备大幅裁员
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，经过多年研发，蓝色起源公司（Blue Origin）正准备大幅裁员以降低成本，并专注于增加火箭发射次数。【原文：Blue Origin is preparing for significant job cuts to reduce costs and focus on increasing rocket launches after years of research and development, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百度称人工智能模型厄尼四月起可自由使用
item.description: 中国百度周四表示，其人工智能模型 "厄尼 "将从 4 月 1 日起免费使用。【原文：China's Baidu said on Thursday that its artificial intelligence model Ernie would be free from April 1.】

item.title: South32 将美国铝关税视为谈判策略
item.description: 澳大利亚多元化矿业公司 South32 的首席执行官格雷厄姆-科尔（Graham Kerr）周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对铝征收关税更可能是其讨价还价策略的一部分，而非其政府的长期政策。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs on aluminium are more likely to be part of a bargaining strategy than a long-term policy of his administration, said CEO Graham Kerr of Australian diversified miner South32 on Thursday.】

item.title: 派拉蒙频道（包括 CBS 和 Nickelodeon）将退出 YouTube TV
item.description: 媒体巨头派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）的频道，包括哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）和尼克儿童频道（Nickelodeon），将从周四开始无法在 YouTube TV 上播放，因为双方未能达成续约协议。【原文：Media giant Paramount Global's channels, including CBS and Nickelodeon, will be unavailable on YouTube TV starting Thursday after the two companies failed to reach a contract renewal, both parties said.】

item.title: 全球股市因乌克兰和平希望而反弹，债券遭到抛售
item.description: 由于对乌克兰与俄罗斯达成和平协议的前景持乐观态度，美国和欧洲股票期货周四反弹，抵消了国债收益率跳涨的影响，因为通胀高企有可能关闭美国今年任何宽松政策的大门。【原文：U.S. and European stock futures rallied on Thursday on optimism over prospects of a peace deal between Ukraine and Russia, offsetting a jump in Treasury yields as hot inflation threatens to close the door to any policy easing in the U.S. this year.】

item.title: 乌克兰潜在和平协议可能缓解供应中断，石油价格下跌
item.description: 油价周四下跌，原因是人们预期乌克兰与俄罗斯之间可能达成的和平协议将意味着中断供应流动的制裁措施的结束，而美国总统唐纳德-特朗普打算征收对等关税的做法也激起了通胀忧虑。【原文：Oil prices fell on Thursday on expectations a potential peace deal between Ukraine and Russia would mean the end of sanctions that have disrupted supply flows and U.S. President Donald Trump's intention to introduce reciprocal tariffs stoked inflation jitters.】

item.title: Riot Platforms 任命新董事加入董事会，Starboard、DE Shaw 提供意见
item.description: 比特币矿商Riot Platforms周三表示，在投资者Starboard Value和D. E. Shaw的建议下，公司已任命三名新董事进入董事会。【原文：Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms said on Wednesday it has appointed three new directors to its board after inputs from investors Starboard Value and D. E. Shaw.】

item.title: 独家报道摩根大通首席执行官戴蒙揶揄办公室内的工作推诿，要求提高效率
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份录音显示，摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）在周三举行的一次生动的全体会议上，蔑视一些员工要求软化该行五天重返办公室政策的呼声。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon scorned calls from some employees to soften the bank's five-day return-to-office policy in an animated town hall meeting on Wednesday, according to a recording reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: OpenAI 称马斯克的收购要约与他对其提起的诉讼相矛盾
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在周三提交给联邦法院的一封信中写道，马斯克希望收购 OpenAI，使其成为一个营利实体，这与他的诉讼相冲突，他认为 ChatGPT 制造商的资产不应该用于谋取私利。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk's bid to buy OpenAI, which wants to be a for-profit entity, clashes with his lawsuit arguing that assets of the ChatGPT maker should not be for private gain, OpenAI wrote in a letter it submitted to a federal court on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布后日元走低，乌克兰和谈提振欧元
item.description: 周四，在消费者物价指数高于预期之后，美元兑日元汇率保持在一周高点附近，而华盛顿希望与俄罗斯开始谈判以结束乌克兰战争的消息则支撑了欧元。【原文：The U.S. dollar held near a one-week high against the Japanese yen on Thursday after a hotter-than-expected consumer prices reading, while the euro was shored up by news that Washington aims to begin talks with Russia to end the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 福特汽车首席执行官在提出对关税的担忧后与立法者举行会议
item.description: 福特公司首席执行官吉姆-法利（Jim Farley）在本周提出对墨西哥和加拿大征收 25% 关税将给美国汽车业带来 "巨大冲击 "的担忧后，于周三会见了美国国会议员。【原文：Ford CEO Jim Farley met with lawmakers in the U.S. Congress on Wednesday after raising concerns this week that 25% tariffs on Mexico and Canada would "blow a hole" in the U.S. auto industry.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，收购公司争相收购网络安全公司趋势科技
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）、Advent International 和 EQT AB 等私募股权公司正在竞争收购日本网络安全公司趋势科技（Trend Micro），该公司市值达 1.32 万亿日元（约合 85.4 亿美元）。【原文：Bain Capital, Advent International and EQT AB are among the private equity firms competing to acquire Japanese cybersecurity firm Trend Micro , which has a market value of 1.32 trillion yen ($8.54 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易部长表示，澳大利亚在美国的支持下增加铝出口
item.description: 澳大利亚贸易部长唐-法雷尔（Don Farrell）周四表示，经华盛顿批准，澳大利亚增加了对美国的铝供应量，解决了堪培拉要求豁免美国铝和钢关税的一个障碍。【原文：Australia's trade minister Don Farrell said on Thursday the country had increased aluminium supply to the U.S. with Washington's approval, addressing a hurdle to Canberra's request for an exemption from U.S. tariffs on aluminium and steel.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Anthropic 预计 2027 年收入将飙升至 345 亿美元
item.description: 据 The Information 周三报道，Anthropic 预计其收入在 2027 年将增长到 345 亿美元。【原文：Anthropic is projecting that its revenue could grow to as high as $34.5 billion in 2027, The Information reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲电动汽车电池材料初创企业在回收利用方面取得突破
item.description: 两家欧洲初创企业周四表示，他们在回收电动汽车电池材料方面取得了里程碑式的进展，这些材料将满足欧洲法规的要求，减少中国在整个电池供应链中的主导地位，并降低二氧化碳排放量。【原文：Two European startups said on Thursday they had hit milestones in recycling electric vehicle battery materials that will be needed to meet European regulations, reduce China's dominance of the entire battery supply chain and lower CO2 emissions.】

item.title: 美国通胀升温，股市下跌，美元反弹
item.description: 周三，美国股市期货下跌，美元上涨，此前的数据显示，1月份消费者通胀率的回升幅度超过预期，这凸显了美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）关于不急于降息的信息。【原文：U.S. stock futures tumbled and the dollar rose on Wednesday after data showed consumer inflation picked up more than expected in January, underscoring Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's message that there is no rush to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财政部葡萄酒公司利润增长，但财政部高端品牌业务疲软
item.description: 周四，澳大利亚财政部葡萄酒公司（Treasury Wine Estates）公布上半年利润增长近33%，原因是其奢侈品牌奔富（Penfolds）的增长和DAOU葡萄园的贡献增加，但部分增长被财政部高端品牌（Treasury Premium Brands）的疲软所抵消。【原文：Australia's Treasury Wine Estates posted nearly a 33% rise in first-half profit on Thursday, on growth in its luxury label Penfolds and higher contribution from DAOU vineyards, partly offset by weakness in Treasury Premium Brands.】

item.title: 合并谈判陷入僵局后，日产和本田将更新双方关系
item.description: 预计日产和本田将于周四就其不确定的关系展开新一轮谈判，在两家日本汽车制造商的谈判破裂后，它们很可能会正式取消合并计划。【原文：Nissan and Honda are expected to lay out a new stage in their uncertain relationship on Thursday, one that is likely to see them formally call off a plan to merge after talks between the two Japanese automakers foundered.】

item.title: 信中称，美国司法部将停止维护联邦贸易委员会和全国劳资关系委员会的独立性
item.description: 据一位民主党国会议员周三发布的一封信称，美国司法部将停止维护三个消费者和工人保护机构的独立地位。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice will cease defending the independent status of three consumer and worker protection agencies, according to a letter posted by a Democratic member of Congress on Wednesday.】

item.title: 工会起诉特朗普，担心大规模解雇联邦雇员
item.description: 五个工会周三起诉特朗普政府，要求阻止他们所谓的可能大规模解雇数十万名顶住压力接受买断的联邦雇员的行为。【原文：Five unions sued the Trump administration on Wednesday, seeking to block what they called the possible mass firing of hundreds of thousands of federal employees who resist pressure to accept buyouts.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，马斯克的 X 公司同意支付约 1,000 万美元和解特朗普诉讼案
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 同意支付约 1000 万美元，以解决美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对该公司及其前首席执行官提起的诉讼。【原文：Elon Musk's social media platform X has agreed to pay about $10 million to settle a lawsuit that U.S. President Donald Trump brought against the company and its former chief executive, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 由于美元走强的影响，Equinix 预测季度和全年收入低于预期
item.description: Equinix 周三预测第一季度和全年营收低于预期，受美元走强的影响，人们对企业加倍努力采用生成式人工智能而在数据中心扩建方面投入巨资的担忧加剧。【原文：Equinix forecast first-quarter and annual revenue below estimates on Wednesday, hurt by a strong dollar amid rising concerns about hefty spending on data center expansion as businesses double down on generative AI adoption.】

item.title: 巴拿马船舶注册处称其 "不是逃避制裁的避风港
item.description: 中美洲国家巴拿马海事局周三表示，巴拿马已经取得进展，将不符合巴拿马国旗标准的船只从其注册表中剔除，以回应美国对巴拿马允许受制裁国家移动悬挂巴拿马国旗船只的批评。【原文：Panama has made progress stripping vessels from its registry that do not meet its flag's standards, the Central American nation's Maritime Authority said on Wednesday, responding to U.S. criticism that it allowed sanctioned countries to move ships with the Panamanian flag.】

item.title: 米高梅股价大涨，季度利润和收入均超预期
item.description: 赌场运营商米高梅国际酒店集团（MGM Resorts International）周三公布的第四季度利润和收入均超出预期，主要得益于旗下各酒店预订量增加。【原文：Casino operator MGM Resorts International beat fourth-quarter profit and revenue estimates on Wednesday, aided by strength from more bookings across its properties.】

item.title: 早间竞价乌克兰停火希望缓解美国通胀打击
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 削减成本抵消锂价格下跌影响，Albemarle 实现季度盈利
item.description: 全球最大的锂生产商阿尔伯马尔公司（Albemarle）周三表示，由于成本削减帮助抵消了用于制造电动汽车电池的金属价格的暴跌，该公司实现了季度盈利。【原文：Albemarle , the world's largest producer of lithium, said on Wednesday it swung to a quarterly profit as cost cuts helped offset plunging prices for the metal used to make electric vehicle batteries.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将于周三签署互惠关税令
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将于周三签署一项命令，对所有向美国进口商品征收关税的国家征收对等关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he will sign an order on Wednesday to impose reciprocal tariffs on every country that charges duties on U.S. imports.】

item.title: Reddit 预计季度营收高于预期
item.description: Reddit 周三预计，第一季度营收将高于华尔街预期，这主要得益于其人工智能内容授权交易和强劲的数字广告支出。【原文：Reddit forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on its artificial intelligence content licensing deals and a robust digital advertising spend.】

item.title: 思科上调全年收入预期
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems）周三上调了年度营收预期，押注在人工智能技术蓬勃发展的背景下对其云网络设备的需求增加，从而使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 6.7%。【原文：Cisco Systems raised its annual revenue forecast on Wednesday, betting on higher demand for its cloud networking gear amid a boom in the artificial intelligence technology, sending its shares up 6.7% in extended trading.】

item.title: 大选后交易狂潮提升交易量，Robinhood 盈利创历史新高
item.description: 交易平台 Robinhood 周三公布，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得总统大选后，股票和加密货币市场的疯狂活动推动下，第四季度利润激增。【原文：Trading platform Robinhood reported a surge in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, fueled by frenetic activity in equity and crypto markets following Donald Trump's presidential election victory.】
